pages.text: $(l)Zen Garden$() is a biome in $(l)OverWorld$(). it is a quiet and peaceful land where $(l)no creatures will naturally spawn$().$(br)There are 2 kinds of special plants: $(#ff0000)nut trees and chompers$()$(br)[Other content is coming soon]

pages.title: Chomper Plant
pages.text: $(l)Chompers$() are very $(l)rare$(), so it will take a lot of effort to find them.
